QuestData.Title: Talbuk Training: Rakkiri
QuestData.Description: We shall start training the talbuk here, on the icy plains of Frostfire Ridge. We must train it rigorously, or else it may become afraid at the sight of combat, and run.$B$BFind the great blood-sucker, Rakkiri, out on the frozen plains, and bring him down astride your talbuk. That will give it a taste for combat.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Rakkiri while riding your Talbuk-In-Training.
